tool_description: Creates and manages warehouse zones with hierarchical organization including sections, aisles, and temperature/security classifications.

warehouse_id.description: Unique identifier for the warehouse facility

zone_name.description: Name for the warehouse zone (e.g., 'A1', 'Frozen Storage', 'High Security')

zone_type.description: Zone classification: general, frozen, hazmat, high_value, staging, shipping

error_messages: Invalid warehouse_id: Warehouse ID must be a non-empty string and must correspond to an existing warehouse.
Duplicate zone_name: Zone name already exists in this warehouse. Use a unique zone name.
Invalid zone_type: Must be one of [general, frozen, hazmat, high_value, staging, shipping].
usage: Provide warehouse_id, zone_name, and zone_type to create a new warehouse zone. The tool establishes the basic zone structure for subsequent bin creation.

zone_id.description: Generated unique identifier for the created zone

creation_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the zone was created
